results.title: Metformin efficacy and safety as an adjunctive treatment for irritability in children with autism spectrum disorder: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled trial.
results.text_hl: Among the other four subscales of ABC-C, the @DISEASE_Hyperkinesis @DISEASE_MESH:D006948 @@@hyperactivity@@@/noncompliance score showed a significant drop during the baseline-to-week-5 period (p = 0.021). In addition, @<m>DISEASE_Speech_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013064 @@@inappropriate speech@@@ subscales decreased significantly from baseline-to-week 5 in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ compared to the placebo group (p = 0.045).
